0.tooltip.random-toys.helper: Right-click on item stacks or blocks to see how to use them.
1.tooltip.random-toys.randomizer_block: Right-click to fill or clear it.
2.tooltip.random-toys.randomizer_block: Get a random number with comparator.
3.tooltip.random-toys.randomizer_block: Note that the comparator might not work properly without a Block Update.
1.tooltip.random-toys.coppered_redstone_: The power decreases twice as fast.
1.tooltip.random-toys.disposable_spawner: Might be suitable for structure building.
0.tooltip.random-toys.zz_core: Try to use it while sneaking on a crafting table!
0.tooltip.random-toys.blackstone_process: Try to put blackstones or gilded ones in it!
0.tooltip.random-toys.compressor: Automatically compresses items that can be converted...
1.tooltip.random-toys.compressor: For instance gold nugget -> gold ingot -> gold block...
3.tooltip.random-toys.compressor: Can be locked just like hoppers.
1.tooltip.random-toys.experience_collect: Right-click to extract experience, and Shift+Right-click to insert...
2.tooltip.random-toys.experience_collect: Can be right-clicked with bottles, books, and repairable tools...
3.tooltip.random-toys.experience_collect: For nearby compressors, books inside can be enchanted.
4.tooltip.random-toys.experience_collect: Can be locked just like hoppers.
0.tooltip.random-toys.transfer: Transfer stacks from nearby compressors to compressor under it.
1.tooltip.random-toys.transfer: Can be locked just like hoppers.
0.tooltip.random-toys.disenchantmentor: Automatically disenchant items in it and release experience orbs like grindstones.
1.tooltip.random-toys.disenchantmentor: Can be locked just like hoppers.
0.tooltip.random-toys.ender_linker: Link to another mod container, access them everywhere in any dimension.
1.tooltip.random-toys.ender_linker: GUI might not work for far containers; use transfers instead.
2.tooltip.random-toys.ender_linker: Bind block with ender linker configurator.
1.tooltip.random-toys.ender_linker_confi: Right-click on a container and then the ender linker to bind it.
2.tooltip.random-toys.ender_linker_confi: Shift right-click on a ender linker to check its binding position.
0.tooltip.random-toys.glasses: Wear them on to avoid looking at enderman.
gamerule.dispenserHarvestCrops: Dispenser harvests some crops with shears (including apple leaves, nether warts, sweet berry bushes)
gamerule.dispenserHarvestCropDamageTool: Shears damages when used by dispensers
